function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Absence of specific treatment or vaccine for COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of severe illness and complications for infected individuals","Mitigation":"Research and development of effective treatments and vaccines; implementation of preventive measures","Technologies":"Medical research and development, vaccination technology, public health measures","People":"Infected individuals, especially those at higher risk","Owner":"Medical research institutions, healthcare organizations, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Asymptomatic transmission of COVID-19","Impact":"Unrecognized spread of the virus among the population","Mitigation":"Regular testing, contact tracing, and public health education on preventive measures","Technologies":"Diagnostic testing, contact tracing technology, public health communication tools","People":"General population, particularly those in close contact with infected individuals","Owner":"Health agencies, public health authorities, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Higher risk of severe illness for older adults and those with existing medical conditions","Impact":"Increased likelihood of severe illness, hospitalization, and complications","Mitigation":"Protection measures for high-risk groups, vaccination prioritization, and disease management strategies","Technologies":"Vaccination technology, telemedicine, remote monitoring devices","People":"Older adults, individuals with medical conditions","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, public health authorities, community support networks"}]}
